# Genius Tech UAE - Phone & Laptop Repair Service

> Dubai Marina's trusted device repair experts since 2018.

## Quick Facts
- Business Name: Genius Tech UAE
- Type: Mobile Phone and Laptop Repair Service
- Location: West Avenue Building, Shop 1, Al Yahoom St, Dubai Marina, Dubai, UAE
- Hours: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM, 7 days a week (including weekends and holidays)
- WhatsApp: +971547507842 (primary contact - fastest response)
- Phone: +971547507842
- Email: info@geniustechuae.com
- Website: https://geniustechuae.com
- Google Rating: 4.9/5 stars (230+ verified reviews)
- Established: 2018

## Service Areas (Free Pickup & Delivery)
- Dubai Marina - Primary location, immediate service
- JLT (Jumeirah Lake Towers) - 5-10 minute response
- JBR (Jumeirah Beach Residence) - 5-10 minute response
- Palm Jumeirah - Available on request
- Downtown Dubai - Available on request

## Services Offered

### iPhone Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 200-1200 (depending on model)
- Battery Replacement: AED 150-350
- Charging Port Repair: AED 150-300
- Water Damage Recovery: AED 200-500
- Back Glass Replacement: AED 200-400

### MacBook Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 800-2500
- Battery Replacement: AED 350-950
- Keyboard Replacement: AED 400-1200
- Logic Board Repair: AED 500-1500
- SSD Upgrade: AED 300-800

### Samsung & Android Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 250-800
- Battery Replacement: AED 150-300
- Charging Port Repair: AED 100-250

### iPad Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 300-900
- Battery Replacement: AED 250-500

### Other Services
- Data Recovery: AED 200-500
- Software Issues: AED 100-200
- Device Diagnostics: Free

## Unique Selling Points
1. Same-day repair service - Most repairs completed within 2-4 hours
2. FREE pickup and delivery in Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR
3. WhatsApp-first communication for fastest response
4. 7-day warranty on all repairs
5. Multi-language support: English, Arabic, Hindi, Urdu, Russian, French, Spanish
6. No appointment needed - Walk-ins welcome
7. Transparent pricing - No hidden fees
8. Premium quality OEM-grade parts

- 6+ years of experience in device repair
- 10,000+ devices successfully repaired
- Expert certified technicians

- Most competitive prices in Dubai Marina area

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How long does iPhone screen repair take?
A: Most iPhone screen repairs are completed within 30-60 minutes. Same-day service guaranteed.

Q: Do you offer pickup and delivery?
A: Yes! We offer FREE pickup and delivery in Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR. Just WhatsApp us your location.

Q: What warranty do you provide?
A: All repairs come with a 7-day warranty covering parts and labor.

Q: What are your working hours?
A: We're open 10 AM to 10 PM, 7 days a week, including weekends and holidays.

Q: How can I contact you?
A: WhatsApp is the fastest way to reach us at +971547507842. You can also call the same number.

Located in West Avenue Building, Dubai Marina. Look for "Pluspoint Mini Mart" - we're inside the shop. Nearest metro: DMCC Metro Station (5-minute walk).
